name: Kessoku Band Mendako from Bocchi the Rock
description:
Kessoku Band is the main band featured in Bocchi the Rock!, a 4-koma manga and anime series by Aki Hamaji. The members are Hitori Gotoh/Bocchi (guitar), Nijika Ijichi (drummer), Ryo Yamada (bass) and Ikuyo Kita (guitar). They are based in the live house STARRY in Shimokitazawa in the series.

Mendako form is a meme that originally represent the internal mind situations of Bocchi who suffers from social anxiety.
